title: babo
author: babo
created_time: May 02, 2023, 12:07:37 PMLast edit: May 02, 2023, 12:18:18 PM by babo
content: a guy on telegram contacts me because he has a problem with 2FAhe explains the problem to me and since I sometimes recover wallets for poor newbies, I didn't ask myself the problembut I was suspicious:- who gives you 0.1 just to withdraw 1 btc, strangeI made an account on this site- no email confirmation (umm suspicious)register account, send user id and guy send me 1 bitcoinat the time of picking up- 0.01 btc fee requested to confirm account (VERY SUSPICIOUS)I communicate this to the customer, who gets a little angry and asks me to send him the money back, when he sends it back he asks me for a fee of 0.01I tell the guy that it seems very suspicious to me and that it seems to me a scam, he tells me I have taken the site and it is legitthen my doubts are confirmed, I mention it to the guy who starts to say, put the money (yeah) you put it, I told him, you just withdrew 1 btcoh no I already spent it..Sure, and I'm dumbI look at the domain, registered in February 2023, now I have no doubts it's a scamhttps://uk.godaddy.com/whois/results.aspx?domain=bitzad.comi try to do some sell trade of 0.1 btc for usdt, duplicate orders, which exchange has these shitty bugs? it makes me laughtake careI tried to do a fake blackmail, I told him I will write a post in your scam forum if you give me 0.1 btc I won't say anythingand they answered like thisQuoteWe do not care about this. We have already a lot of users and we will not change our protections policy just because of you

comments.author: babo
comments.body: the exchange is written in nodejs (express)and probably is this https://www.coinsclone.com/ estetic is similar and is written in nodejs use websocket and other similar tecnologies

comments.author: Avirunes
comments.body: Kind of similar to exchange, gambling site scams where a telegram user asks that he has some balance stuck and they will give you a good chunk of balance if you do things for them. Always try to ignore such messages, saves your time.I still receive some telegram messages promoting some sites and how good their offers are and the high returns they can give me if I invest under a program. I always ignore such messages. They get all the Telegram UID's from some groups and start messaging them one by one either promoting some projects or some scam sites. There should be something like reporting these users on telegram.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Here is how you spot a scam:A guy, girl, or transvestite contacts you on Telegram. That's it. Please follow me for more trading advice. Joking aside, 8 or 9/10 unsolicited PMs over Telegram are surely a scam in one way or the other. It's not worth anyone's time.This fake deposit scam sadly still works. Please deposit 0.01 BTC as a fee to withdraw the 1 BTC we gave you, and from where we can't take fees ourselves.

comments.author: babo
comments.body: no i not ignorei do the "job" and verify and after i write a post/thread about this scameasy guys, in the past i am a scam hunter, now i have less time for search and destroy a sons of bitch, they COME TO ME for free i not waste time for search, they come to me

comments.author: Lillominato89
comments.body: There are now many bitcoin scams running on Telegram, I personally have blocked more than 500 scammers who contact you privately! but one thing is for sure! when they start contacting you scammers with profile photos of beautiful Chinese girls bitcoin starts to go up in price ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ Dear Babo anyway, thanks for warning the forum in time, maybe you will limit the scams to some naive people

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: babo on May 02, 2023, 12:07:37 PMI tried to do a fake blackmail, I told him I will write a post in your scam forum if you give me 0.1 btc I won't say anythingand they answered like thisWe do not care about this. We have already a lot of users and we will not change our protections policy just because of youLOL.I am reminded of the reverse scam someone did on r/scams. To sum it up - iirc, dude pretended he didn't know USDT transfers needed ETH for gas fees and asked the scammer to send ETH for about 30 bucks or smth so he can transfer his fortune. Scammer bites and OP disappears lol.But this probably worked mainly because we're only talking about beer money. In any case, I'd say it's always a good thing to waste a scammer's time and perhaps annoy them along the way hahah

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Quote from: Lillominato89 on May 02, 2023, 12:33:15 PMThere are now many bitcoin scams running on Telegram, I personally have blocked more than 500 scammers who contact you privately! but one thing is for sure! when they start contacting you scammers with profile photos of beautiful Chinese girls bitcoin starts to go up in price ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ Dear Babo anyway, thanks for warning the forum in time, maybe you will limit the scams to some naive peopleWow, so many are trying to scam you with 500 scammers trying to scam you.Â  Telegram is a nest of scammers, if someone tries to cheat he will definitely send a message first without being asked and that is their classic way of pretending to have a problem with the fake exchange he made, oh unfortunately we all realize this because it is very clear suspect him.I've only had that experience on Discord but I'm just ignoring because people who PM like first are trying to cheat.

comments.author: Lillominato89
comments.body: Quote from: salad daging on May 03, 2023, 09:04:05 AMQuote from: Lillominato89 on May 02, 2023, 12:33:15 PMThere are now many bitcoin scams running on Telegram, I personally have blocked more than 500 scammers who contact you privately! but one thing is for sure! when they start contacting you scammers with profile photos of beautiful Chinese girls bitcoin starts to go up in price ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ Dear Babo anyway, thanks for warning the forum in time, maybe you will limit the scams to some naive peopleWow, so many are trying to scam you with 500 scammers trying to scam you.Â  Telegram is a nest of scammers, if someone tries to cheat he will definitely send a message first without being asked and that is their classic way of pretending to have a problem with the fake exchange he made, oh unfortunately we all realize this because it is very clear suspect him.I've only had that experience on Discord but I'm just ignoring because people who PM like first are trying to cheat.oh yes, exactly I blocked 604 scammers and spammers who contact me without permission, with some I enjoyed trolling with them

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: babo on May 02, 2023, 12:07:37 PMa guy on telegram contacts me because he has a problem with 2FAIsn't it supposed that when you have a problem with two-factor authentication, you can't even send money to your friend and not just withdraw money.Those scammers are wasting their time, this trick is old and will only fool a beginner who believes everything, trying to scam a person with experience in cryptocurrencies with such fraud is pure stupidity.
